attributes.action: make life sentences,mean the THE REMAINDER OF THEIR  NATURAL LIFE for child killers and baby rapists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop calling life sentences by that name unless they mean the rest of the offenders natural life.the scum that killed and raped his 2 year old niece should rot  till he dies in a stinking concrete cell, not be out in 10 or 12 years.these sub humans cannot be rehabilitated so if you won't hang them make the bas***s suffer like their victims.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
